name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Features complete Web UI with three-dot menu integration, drag-and-drop upload, and audio player.
changelog: Major version bump to 0.0.11.00. Fixed RequireJS availability with robust fallback system. Menu integration now works with proper dialog handling. All dependencies properly packaged.
